function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dense distribution of sensing devices increases the risk of pathogen spread in case of contamination.","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of pathogens leading to potential health hazards for individuals in the environment.","Mitigation":"Implementing regular cleaning and maintenance protocols for the sensing devices to prevent contamination.","Technologies":"Self-cleaning surfaces, antimicrobial coatings, and industrial robots for cleaning and maintenance.","People":"Individuals in the environment where sensing devices are deployed.","Owner":"Facility management and maintenance staff."},{"Description":"Wireless transmission of data between nodes may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases if nodes are contaminated.","Impact":"Unintentional transmission of pathogens through the wireless network, posing health risks to individuals in the vicinity.","Mitigation":"Regularly sanitizing and inspecting the hardware components of the nodes to prevent contamination.","Technologies":"Ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) for node sanitization and visual inspection systems for contamination detection.","People":"Users and maintenance staff responsible for the nodes.","Owner":"Network administrators and maintenance personnel."},{"Description":"Largescale deployment of WSN without proper security measures may lead to unauthorized access and potential malicious interference, including spreading malware or viruses.","Impact":"Compromised data integrity, unauthorized access to sensitive information, and potential dissemination of harmful software to connected devices.","Mitigation":"Implementing strong encryption protocols, authentication measures, and regular security updates for the WSN infrastructure.","Technologies":"Advanced encryption standards (AES), biometric authentication systems, and intrusion detection systems.","People":"Administrators, security personnel, and users of the WSN.","Owner":"Technology and security departments responsible for the WSN infrastructure."}]}
